text: 10.22 Wkp 8.30, Ese 36.25, Epe 3.12, 5.26, Hib 9.14, Jem 1.6, 1 Jo 3.21 Nɨkɨm ne ak dɨl, gos chɨnop nab ayaŋ yokup. Anɨb ak chɨn nopun, chɨbol nab chɨn ayaŋ gach ma mɨdɨl, mɨdtep gɨl binɨb ne mɨdobun. Pen wak chɨnop ñɨg kayɨg tep tek askoy pakñek, binɨb suŋtep ne mɨdobun. Anɨb ak tek, gos chɨn nab ayaŋ mɨdtep gɨl yepɨs ma gɨnɨgun, gos awl ma nɨgun agɨl pel gos nɨŋɨd nop chɨg tep gɨnɨgun. Anɨgon nɨm, chɨn ma pɨlɨkɨl God yɨl monmon ownɨgun.
